name: .ACD-BAK File Extension
summary: Learn about .ACD-BAK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Backup file created by MAGIX ACID Pro, Music Studio, or Xpress; stores a backup copy of the currently open .ACD project; saves the real-time copy of the project while editing a music compilation.

content: ACD-BAK files are created automatically by the software. They are saved to the same directory as the ACD project file. The ACD-BAK file can be used for restoring the most recent edits in the event the program unexpectedly shuts down.
NOTE: ACID was developed by Sony until it was sold to MAGIX in 2016.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
